name: BMX Bike Stunt Race
description:
Go ahead and live out your motorbike racing dreams with BMX Bike Stunt King - Racing Game

Ride your bmx on unusually challenging obstacle courses and try to complete all the levels, in this adrenaline action-packed , heart-thumping BMX game.

Features:

-Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking behavior to the bike and rider.

-Unique and smooth gameplay

- Addictive , exciting and hard levels

-Accelerometer support

-Earn stars for your best local times.

Lets Play BMX Bike Stunt King And Break The Top Score.
